title: My Pixel phone will not recognize my fingerprint sign-in since the last Android update. Help!
content: I have to use my pattern to open any locked folders on my phone. I verified my fingerprints are loaded and accepted. I can use fingerprint sign-in for my Norton AppLock also on the phone. My system folder no longer locks. Inconsistent & very confusing. Please help. Maybe a patch/repair in the next update??
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
